title: Duzzit Amazing Baking Soda Multi Purpose Household Cleaner , 500 g (Pack of 1)
features: DUZZIT AMAZING BAKING SODA NATURAL CLEANER: A powerful multipurpose cleaning action cleans surfaces and appliances
VERSATILE: Use applied to a wet sponge for stubborn stain removal. To remove baked, burnt or dried on food, grease or fats, shake Duzzit Baking Soda into hot water then soak dishes

MULTI PURPOSE CLEANING: Duzzit Amazing Baking Soda is non-scratch and a natural cleaning product. Suitable for household use, this multipurpose cleaner is perfect for removing tough and stubborn stains from carpets, kitchen and bathroom surfaces, oven and bakeware

TOUGH ON STAINS: Powerful cleaning action eliminates grease and other stubborn stains. For stubborn stain removal shake onto a wet sponge or cloth and wipe clean. To remove baked, burnt or dried on food, grease and fats shake Duzzit Baking Soda directly onto the problem area, add hot water and leave to soak for 15 minutes. Wash as normal
ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Size: 500g Resealable unit
description: Product Description Duzzit Amazing Baking Soda keeps your home stain free. This non scratch natural cleaner is perfect for removing stubborn stains from kitchen and bathroom surfaces, ovens, bakeware and more. Simply shake directly onto stained area, add hot water and leave to soak before wiping those stubborn stains away. Securely re-seal container between uses. 500g container Ingredients Contains: Sodium Bicarbonate CAS 1455-55-8
